meanings.definition: To give as a gift or honor.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys bestowing presents on her friends during the holidays.
meanings.sent2: The king will be bestowing medals upon the brave soldiers.
meanings.sent3: The magician was bestowing magical powers upon his pet rabbit.
meanings.sent4: The sun bestows its warmth upon the earth each morning.
meanings.sent5: The fairy bestowing wishes upon the children made them smile with joy.

meanings.sent1: The university will be bestowing degrees upon the graduating students.
meanings.sent2: The mayor will be bestowing awards to the volunteers at the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The robot was bestowing knowledge upon the curious students.
meanings.sent4: The rain bestows a refreshing feeling on the parched land.
meanings.sent5: The teacher bestowing wisdom upon her students was admired by all.

meanings.sent1: The charity organization is bestowing aid to the families affected by the disaster.
meanings.sent2: The company will be bestowing bonuses to the hardworking employees.
meanings.sent3: The genie was bestowing unlimited wishes upon the lucky person.
meanings.sent4: The river bestows life-giving water to the surrounding villages.
meanings.sent5: The kind gesture of bestowing help to a stranger can make a big difference.
